bibl.title: Hisayo Kuwahara v. Henry M. White. Certificate
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: In the District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division.
In the Matter of the Petition of Sakutaro Kuwahara for a Writ of Habeas Corpus

I, L.A.Michelson, a Notary Public in and for the State of Washington, duly commissioned and sworn, and the Notary designated in the Notice given by James Kiefer, attorney for the petitioner above-named for the taking of depositions of J.H. Galbraith and R.Ode, at Eatonville, in the County of Pierce, in the State of Washington, on the 31st day of January, 1920, do hereby certify that by reason of being detained at Port Townsend, Washington, on business, I was unable to attend at the time and place mentioned in said notice, and notified James Kiefer, said attorney, to that effect before January 31st, 1920.
WITNESS my hand and official seal this 2nd day of February, A.D.1920.
Notary Public in and for the State of Washington, residing at Seattle.
